mnd14:3.5: tassa → idaṃ padaṃ bj, sya-all potthakesu

mnd14:12.6: abbahanaṃ → abbūhanaṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1); abbhuhanaṃ (mr) | papātanaṃ → pavāhanaṃ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
mnd14:11.5: attā → attaṃ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | nirattā → nirattaṃ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
